content.text: Hello! I am a business man, an insurance salesman and I love to use my art to communicate. I am a bit clumsy, but I don't let it stop me from living my life.
Hello! I am a female in my thirties and I was diagnosed with autism. I love the color pink and I prefer to make my own vegan fast food at home. I take a walk to clear my head and release endorphins.
Nice to meet you! I've been trying to eat healthier lately and I've been trying to cut out meat. Do you have any vegan recipes you would recommend?
I have a lot of recipes that I love. I'd be happy to share them with you!
That would be great! I'm always looking for new ways to cook.
Okay, I'll send you some links to my recipes later today.
Awesome! Thank you!
You're welcome!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher at a local elementary school.
Oh, that sounds like a great job!
It is. I love working with kids.
I'm glad to hear that. I've always thought about being a teacher, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough to handle all the chaos.
It can be chaotic, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint and draw. I also like to go for walks.
That sounds nice. I love to paint and draw too.
Really? That's great! We should exchange art sometime.
That would be fun!
Okay, sounds good.
Nice talking to you!
You too
